phrs.translation: [俚语]正是需要的东西；正对头，妙极了

sentences.sentence: That was a very large and whiskered man .
sentences.translation: 那人身材魁伟，蓄着小胡子。

sentences.sentence: “There is no point in a loach trying to mimic a goldfish, ” he said, comparing himself to the whiskered, mud-dwelling fish.
sentences.translation: “一个泥鳅尝试去模仿金鱼是毫无意义的，”他说，将自己比作须状地泥生的泥鳅。

sentences.sentence: This paper proceeds to investigate the dry wearing behavior of the aluminium borate crystal whiskered reinforced LY12 aluminium.
sentences.translation: 对一种硼酸铝晶须增强LY 12铝进行了干磨损行为研究。
